extendedInfo.description: Introducing the official Chesterfield Towne Center app â your digital shopping center companion.MALL DIRECTORY â browse by category or view stores alphabetically with detailed info, map location and phone number for every retailer or dining establishment. Even get a quick glance if the store currently has a sale.INTERACTIVE MAP â search for and display the location of individual stores and closest parking, as well as restrooms, escalators, elevators, ATMs and other mall amenities.SALES & EVENTS â view a detailed listing of sales and events going on at the center and even create a favorites list to help plan your shopping trip.WHERE DID I PARK? â save your parking location by using your phoneâs GPS, taking a photo, recording a voice note or typing a text reminder to easily locate your vehicle.SHOPPING LIST â get organized by creating a custom shopping list. For every item on your list, select the retailers youâd like to visit and locate them on the mall map with one touch. You can even email your shopping list for others to view.CENTER INFORMATION â view shopping hours, center address and phone number, guest services information, weather forecast and more.
